command.text: declare @$exists nvarchar(512), @$recordHasBeenChanged nvarchar(512) select @$exists = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Loại công %s đã có hoặc lồng nhau trong danh mục.' else N'The workday type %s is invalid or already exists.' end select @$recordHasBeenChanged = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Loại công %s đã được sửa hoặc xóa bởi người sử dụng khác.' else N'The workday type %s has been modified or deleted by another user.' end

if exists(select * from @@table where ((ma_loai like rtrim(@ma_loai) + '%') or rtrim(@ma_loai) like rtrim(ma_loai) + '%')) begin select 'ma_loai' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_loai)) as message return end select @datetime0 = getdate(), @datetime2 = getdate(), @user_id0 = @@userID, @user_id2 = @@userID

if not exists(select * from @@table where ma_loai = $ma_loai.OldValue) begin select 'ma_loai' as field, replace(@$recordHasBeenChanged, '%s', rtrim($ma_loai.OldValue)) as message return end if @ma_loai <> $ma_loai.OldValue begin if exists(select * from @@table where ((ma_loai like rtrim(@ma_loai) + '%') or rtrim(@ma_loai) like rtrim(ma_loai) + '%') and ma_loai <> $ma_loai.OldValue) begin select 'ma_loai' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_loai)) as message return end end
update @@table set datetime2 = getdate(), user_id2 = @@userID where ma_loai = @ma_loai
